entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
